messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Just set your suit sensors to max to find your dead body

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Doctor's Prison Whiskey's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: #4nd%;f4y6,>ï¿½%-BZZZZZZZT

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chief Engineer's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that all of the station's simple animals has developed security level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed very low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Doctor's Prison Whiskey, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telec#MCi46:5.;@63-BZZZZT

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Toxins Mixing Lab.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Massive bluespace translocation detected.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed clown level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that all of the station's bots/animals has developed very low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that all of the station's [REDACTED] has developed command level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Sorry lads i got SSD for this whole time

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a number of wire eating mammals have migrated into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Doctor's Prison Whiskey's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Doctor's Prison Whiskey, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Custodial Closet.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Doctor's Prison Whiskey door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed clown level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.
